name: CyberScape (athanatos_dev)
description:
Just a normal, little walking simulator. There's nothing going on here. Everything is just as it seems. Nothing out of sight :) 

Use WASD to move around and take in the sights :)

Left Click to pick up items, Right Click to throw :) 

ESC to exit when you want :)

*RECOMMENDED* 

Have paper, pencil, and an open tab ready :)
